instruction: Marinate prawns with spices and rest for 30 minutes.
Cook rice with whole spices until 60% done, drain and cool.
Fry onions until golden; blend with tomato, coconut, and aromatics.
Cook prawns in the masala until they turn C-shaped.
Layer rice and masala, cook on low flame (dum) for 20–30 minutes.
Garnish and serve hot with raita.
Simmer on low flame for enhanced flavor.
Add tomatoes and cook until they turn soft.
Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.
